name: Blast the Past
description: Operate a wrecking crane in VR to destroy the last remaining old building in a city of new skyscrapers, push buttons, turn wheels and make sure the ball hits its target!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 (AMD Radeon RX 570) DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Whats this?
